title: What am I blind to, and why can't I see? Why don't I see things about this world? - Quora

response.answer_text: What am I blind to, and why can't I see? Why don't I see things about this world? Not knowing you personally, I can only hazard a guess. But it would appear that most people in the 21st century are blind to God because they are blinded by their sin, and the Devil has let them astray. In this condition, God has “hardened their hearts” - in other words, “the wages of sin is death”, and unless we are humble and plead for God’s help, then the Evil One blinds us to reality, and we spend our time constructing castles in the sky, and cannot see reality all around us.

One will never fully understand anothers experiences without having walked in their shoes. That is their truth. As you grow, learn, and accumulate experiences, that is yours. You will see what you need to see when you need to see it. PLH✌❤
